content: this makes the perfect bag for your tablet books or as a purse for everyday essentials it uses less than a skien of yarn and works up quickly - great for a quick weekend project add a liner and it becomes a treat bag for halloween american terms used chain chain skip skip slip_stitch slip_stitch single_crochet single_crochet double_crochet double_crochet sc3tog single_crochet 3 together materials used 1 skein of k+c essential cotton color zion 4mm crochet hook tapestry needle 4 3mm d-rings
